table_description: Azure Compute Virtual Machine Scale Set

columns.name: name
columns.description: Name of the scale set.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique id identifying the resource in subscription.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the resource in Azure.

columns.name: location
columns.description: The location of the resource.

columns.name: do_not_run_extensions_on_overprovisioned_vms
columns.description: When Overprovision is enabled, extensions are launched only on the requested number of VMs which are finally kept.

columns.name: overprovision
columns.description: Specifies whether the Virtual Machine Scale Set should be overprovisioned.

columns.name: platform_fault_domain_count
columns.description: Fault Domain count for each placement group.

columns.name: single_placement_group
columns.description: When true this limits the scale set to a single placement group, of max size 100 virtual machines.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: The sku name.

columns.name: sku_capacity
columns.description: Specifies the tier of virtual machines in a scale set.

columns.name: sku_tier
columns.description: Specifies the tier of virtual machines in a scale set.

columns.name: unique_id
columns.description: Specifies the ID which uniquely identifies a Virtual Machine Scale Set.

columns.name: extensions
columns.description: Specifies the details of VM Scale Set Extensions.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The identity of the virtual machine scale set, if configured.

columns.name: plan
columns.description: Specifies information about the marketplace image used to create the virtual machine.

columns.name: scale_in_policy
columns.description: Specifies the scale-in policy that decides which virtual machines are chosen for removal when a Virtual Machine Scale Set is scaled-in.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: Resource tags.

columns.name: upgrade_policy
columns.description: The upgrade policy for the scale set.

columns.name: virtual_machine_diagnostics_profile
columns.description: Specifies the boot diagnostic settings state.

columns.name: virtual_machine_extension_profile
columns.description: Specifies a collection of settings for extensions installed on virtual machines in the scale set.

columns.name: virtual_machine_network_profile
columns.description: Specifies properties of the network interfaces of the virtual machines in the scale set.

columns.name: virtual_machine_os_profile
columns.description: Specifies the operating system settings for the virtual machines in the scale set.

columns.name: virtual_machine_storage_profile
columns.description: Specifies the storage settings for the virtual machine disks.

columns.name: virtual_machine_security_profile
columns.description: Specifies the Security related profile settings for the virtual machines in the scale set.

columns.name: zones
columns.description: The Logical zone list for scale set.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
